comment: The empty graph, with vertices but no edges, is a pseudograph. The empty graph is actually a simple graph, see ~ usgr0eop , and therefore also a multigraph ( ` G e. UMGraph ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 11-Oct-2020.)
